name: OI Hair Oil for Softness and Shine
categories: Hair, Hair Styling & Treatments, Hair Oil
about: What it is:A multipurpose oil that detangles, reduces frizz, and leaves hair extraordinarily soft and shiny..Hair Texture:Straight, Wavy, Curly, and Coily.Hair Type:Medium and Thick.Hair Concerns:- Dryness.Key Benefits:- Hydrates and reduces frizz.Highlighted Ingredients:- Roucou Oil: Protects and strengthens hair with beta-carotene and antioxidants..Ingredient Callouts:This product is vegan..What Else You Need to Know:This antioxidant-packed oil protects hair and considerably reduces drying time, with a weightless finish. It contains a carotenoid-rich oil extracted from roucou seeds that reduces damage caused by external aggressors.
ingredients: -Roucou Oil: Protects and strengthens hair with beta-carotene and antioxidants...Cyclopentasiloxane, Disiloxane, Dimethiconol, Cyclohexasiloxane, Ethylhexyl Methoxycinnamate, Parfum/Fragrance, Tocopherol, Helianthus Annuus Seed Oil/Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Bixa Orellana Seed Extract, Citronellol, Mauritia Flexuosa Fruit Oil, Geraniol, Linalool, Alpha-Isomethyl Ionone, Limonene.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-For fine hair, use one pump..-For normal hair, start with two to three pumps and add more if needed..-Before styling, apply evenly to lengths and ends of towel-dried hair. Blow-dry hair or let air-dry..-As a finishing touch, apply to lengths and ends of dry hair.

reviews.review_title: Amazing product, not just for hair!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, gray hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is truly a versatile product!  I received a sample in a previous purchase and thought, okay I'll never use this on my hair.  One day when my face was feeling especially dry, I dabbed it on.  What a wonderful  feeling!  So after my next shower, I lathered it on my whole face.  Next came the hands and neck.  I've ordered it twice since and will gift it to others.
